title: Scoreboard - Hide Scores - Shake to Toggle
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is is on the Scoreboard
and Shake to Toggle is enabled in the App Settings
and the user shakes the iOS device
custom_expected:
Then the Scores will be hidden
and the W/L/S pitchers will be removed
and tapping on the game tile with display the Hide Scores On detail view
